column2: an A.M. Eatery////- Pancake flight: got their peach cobbler (AMAZING
column3: has chopped peach inside the batter with sweet creamy topping)
column4: chocolate (crisp and warm chocolate chips and soft batter very good)
column5: and blueberry danish (lemon curd was such a good accent to this AND there's actually LOTS of blueberries inside!). Our friends also got the upside down pineapple pancake which was also amazing. Tasted like pineapple pie.
